fr.umlv.escape.gesture

Class Gesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.gesture.Gesture

  • public class Gesture
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that allow to detect gestures and calculate forces that they represent

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Gesture.GestureType
      Enum that represent a gesture.

      Add a point to the gesture detector.

      Try to calculate a force given a gesture detected.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gesture

        public Gesture()
        Constructor. Create a gesture with defaults parameters.

      • Gesture

        public Gesture(int minNumOfPoint,
       int marginErrorDiag,
       int marginErrorBack,
       int marginErrorCircle)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        minNumOfPoint - Minimum number of point needed to validate a gesture
        marginErrorDiag - Margin error for diagonals gestures
        marginErrorBack - Margin error for the back off gesture
        marginErrorCircle - Margin error for circles gestures

    • Method Detail

      • getLastGestureDetected

        public Gesture.GestureType getLastGestureDetected()
        Return the last gesture detected.
        Returns:
        The last gesture detected.

      • getLastForce

        public Vec2 getLastForce()
        Return the last force calculated.
        Returns:
        The last force calculated.

      • detectGesture

        public boolean detectGesture()
        Try to detect a gesture. You can get the gesture detected by calling getLastGestureDetected().
        Returns:
        true a gesture has been detected else false.

      • calculForceFromLine

        public boolean calculForceFromLine()
        Try to calculate a force given a gesture detected. You can get the gesture detected by calling getLastForce().
        Returns:
        true a force has been calculated else false.

      • addPoint

        public boolean addPoint(java.awt.Point point)
        Add a point to the gesture detector. When the method detectGesture() will be called it will uses all the point added to detect a gesture.
        Parameters:
        point -
        Returns:
        true if the point could have been added else false.

      • getListPoint

        public java.util.List<java.awt.Point> getListPoint()
        Get the list of point added to the gesture detector.
        Returns:
        The list of point added to the gesture detector.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear the gesture detector to an empty state with no point added and nothing detected.
